info.name: mablog
info.description:
# MAblog API Documentation

## 1. Overview

This API is a JSON-based interface for using **MAblog**'s functionality. 
All requests must begin with **/api** attached to source url i.e. in development env it is localhost/api/your-desired-route .

item.name: posts

request.description:
### 2.1. Get a List of all posts 
Get a List of all published posts (published : true or 1 ) with no pagination.

URL : localhost/api/posts

Request Type :GET


|Parameters | type | required? | description |
| --- | --- | --- | ---| 
| --- | --- | --- | ---| 


|Headers | key | value | Description? |
| --- | --- | --- | ---| 
| Request header | Accept | application/json | Tell the client that we expect a json response from server | 

#### Response 

If successfull you will get a response code of **200** and the posts from database that are published.

response.name: All Posts with default per_page=6 attr
All Posts With Page identifier

query.description: Set a page number from meta attr less than last_pages

response.name: All Posts With custom  posts count per page
All Posts with page identifier and per_page attr

formdata.value: hat will be the best plan.' It sounded
hat will be the best plan.' It sounded an excellent plan, no doubt, and very neatly and simply arranged; the only difficulty was, that her flamingo was gone across to the

response.name: Create Post - success
response.body:
{
    "status": "200",
    "post": {
        "title": "new Post From API",
        "slug": "new-post-from-api",
        "body": "Body Of newpost from api",
        "owner_id": 61,
        "published": "0",
        "updated_at": "1 second ago",
        "created_at": "1 second ago",
        "id": 51,
        "owner": {
            "id": 61,
            "name": "amir danesh",
            "username": "amir",
            "phone": "09356451477",
            "email": "am@am.am",

            "profile_photo_url": "https://ui-avatars.com/api/?name=amir+danesh&color=7F9CF5&background=EBF4FF"
        }
    }
}

item.description:
## 2. Posts CRUD
In this section we will interact with posts crud of **MAblog**.

request.description:
Type :Post 
URI : /api/sanctum/token
Response-type : JSON
Body Params => (username/phone/email), password, device_name
Headers => Accept : application/json
Response : token, user_id

response.name: Generate Token - Credential uncorrect error
Generate Token success tmp
Generate Token - Email
Generate Token - No Data Errors

formdata.description: username must be unique and at least 4 charachters
Password must be at least 8 charachters
This is confirmation of password field

request.description:
Type :Post 
URI : /api/sanctum/token
Response-type : JSON
Body Params => (username/phone/email), password, device_name
Headers => Accept : application/json
Response : token, user_id

response.name: Register User Failed Validation Errors

request.description:
Type :Delete 
URI : /api/sanctum/destroy/token
Response-type : JSON
Authorization Headers : Bearer token
Response : message, status (201)

Details : This request has no body or header specific parameter, it only needs a 
authorization header with value of a Bearer <token> .
tokens are the same as authentication tokens.

response.name: Destroy Token - success

request.description:
Get the user information with a token

Type : GET
Authorization Header : Bearer <token>
Response : user object
